title: At a Michelin-Starred Restaurant, the Ingredients for Romance
description: Marley Brown had no appetite for dating when she met Akeel Shah, her colleague at the restaurant SingleThread. But after they bonded over passions for cooking and their careers, love was on the menu.
dc:creator: Alix Wall
media:credit: Neeta Satam for The New York Times
media:description: Akeel Shah and Marley Brown exchange rings at their Sept. 10 wedding ceremony in Belleville, Ill.
